reviewsJson.markdown:
**RDA** / velocity

**% Used**/5 **coil**/ Clapton **w**/55          
  
**Steep time**-2 weeks  **wicking**/full 
 
**Mouth Feel** -   light on the tongue smooth no throat hit slightly creamy icing  texture and moderately dense         
      
**Flavor Properties** - sweet and sugary as far as cupcake not really getting a lot of cake

**Relatable Flavors** - taste like imitation maple syrup or kind of like eating a vanilla milkshake that has melted

**Off Flavors** - kind of a greasy flavor but I kind of like it        

**Position in the recipe** - figured make a fairly good base note or accent flavor

**Pairings** - should pear nice with other cakes and sweet fruits I also think may go well with custards and ice creams
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Cupcake Batter
